short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a contextual menu to images for keywording actions on stock photography contributor websites (Alamy, Getty, etc)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
No keyboard needed! jKeywording helps you keyword faster your images on stock photography websites.

- Auto-generate caption and keywords for an image in your portfolio, using an AI-powered analysis
- Auto-insert them in your portfolio manager: Alamy's AIM, Getty's iStock batch editor, etc
- Decide how many keywords you want, and if you want them automatically added to your images
